ProductInfo.Features:
GW8604H: Professional 4 Channel H.264 960H & D1 Realtime DVR with HDMI & VGA. 960×480 & 30FPS recording, HI 3520D CPU. iPhone, Android Viewing. New color graphical menu. Network live, backup, playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control
GW726W:1/3" SONY CCD Outdoor or Indoor Camera, 520 TV lines, 26 IR LEDs. 3.6mm Len for Wide Angle View. Metal vandal proof & water proof
Package Includes:     GW8604H DVR with 500GB HDD;     GWLED19IN  - Free 19" Wide Screen LED monitor;     2 x GW726W - 1/3" SONY CCD Camera;
1 x GW60CAW: 60 feet pre-made cable BNC;     1 x GW25CAW: 25 feet pre-made cable BNC;     2 x GW12V0.5A: 12V 0.5A Power Supply for Security Cameras.
ProductInfo.Name: GW Security Inc 2CHV3 4 Channel H.264 960H & D1 Realtime DVR with 2 x 1/3" SONY CCD WaterProof 520 TVL 3.6mm Lens Security Camera, Free LED Monitor (White/Black)
